import React,{useState}from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{login}from"../../features/userSlice";import useFetch from"../../hooks/useFetch";import{setIsLoading}from"../../features/modalSlice";import{loginService}from"../../services/authServices";import DataList from"../DataList/DataList";import"./Login.css";// Import the CSS file
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=_ref=>{let{setIsRegistering}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const dispatch=useDispatch();const customFetch=useFetch();const loginHandler=async e=>{e.preventDefault();dispatch(setIsLoading(true));const data=await customFetch(loginService,{email,password});if(data)dispatch(login(data));dispatch(setIsLoading(false));};const guestHandler=()=>{dispatch(login({id:"guest",isGuest:true}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:loginHandler,className:"login",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"email",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"login-email",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"login-email",placeholder:"johndoe@example.com",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataList,{email:email,setEmail:setEmail})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"login-password",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"login-password",placeholder:"Top secret",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Don't have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>setIsRegistering(true),children:"Register"})," or"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:guestHandler,children:"Continue as a guest"})]})]});};export default Login;
